name: MvM
summary: The robots are here. Defend Mann Co. ! This theme requires 10 players to start, has no voting phase, the night is 35 seconds, and the day is 25 seconds. Everyone has their own unique role, and has to defeat the other team to win (Mann Co. vs Machines)! There is a Sentry Buster at medium-large games which can be sided with either side (even though it's a robot).
author: TheUnknownOne

roles.help: You are sided with the Machines (defeat all of Mann Co.!). You pretty much have nothing else to do other than annoy people in the day with /annoy. You also dodge all day kills.
roles.info: Can annoy (reveal) in the day. Ignores Demoknights. Sided with the Machines.

annoy.msg: ±Tip of the Day: As a Scout, you can annoy others with /annoy.
annoy.revealmsg: NEED A DISPENSER HERE! NEED A DISPENSER HERE! NEED A DISPENSER HERE!

roles.help: You are sided with the Machines (defeat all of Mann Co.!). Hit someone with the /sandman [name] to distract them in the night. Your aim is bad so you have 40% chance to miss, and you can only use it every other night because the ball has to recharge! You also dodge all day kills.
roles.info: Can sandman (distract) one person every other night w/ 40% chance to fail. Ignores Demoknights. Sided with the Machines.

roles.help: You are sided with the Machines (defeat all of Mann Co.!). You have 75% chance to dodge hits for your team! You also dodge all day kills.
roles.info: Has 75% chance to evade a kill in the night. Ignores Demoknights. Sided with the Machines.

roles.help: You are sided with the Machines (defeat all of Mann Co.!). You can kill someone with /explode [name] every other night (because you have to reload, silly), but has 27% chance to fail because your aim isn't really that perfect.
roles.info: Can kill one person every other night w/ 27% chance to fail. Sided with the Machines.

roles.help: You are sided with the Machines (defeat all of Mann Co.!). You can kill someone with /charge [name] in the day, but it takes 3 days to recharge and certain classes dodge it, causing you to die somehow.
roles.info: Can kill one person in the day (can be repeated 3 days afterwards). Sided with the Machines.

roles.help: You are sided with the Machines (defeat all of Mann Co.!). Your fat body allows you to /protect [name] someone in the night. You aren't really the quickest class so most classes would have killed their victim before you could arrive.
roles.info: Can protect one person in the night. Sided with the Machines.
